name: Australia
startIntroPart1: G’day Harold Holt! Time to dive into history and prove you can go the distance—no flippers needed.
startIntroPart2: Guide the land Down Under to new heights (and depths), where legends never vanish!
introduction: G'day Mate! I'm Harold Holt pleasure to meet ya.
hateHello: Wadda you want, you yellow bellied bastards?

name: Kiribati
declaringWar: The tide of our will has turned. Prepare for the storm.
attacked: You have disturbed our peace. The ocean will remember this.
defeated: Our islands may fall, but our spirit endures, like the endless sea.

name: Marshall Islands
declaringWar: Our canoes are ready, our resolve is set. The journey begins.
attacked: We will not go silently to our watery graves. This challenge is met.
defeated: Though the waves may overwhelm us, our legacy sails on.

name: Micronesia
declaringWar: Our unity will guide us. The time for action is now.
attacked: You seek to divide us, but our islands are bound by the sea.
defeated: Our strength lies in our bonds, even in defeat, we remain.

name: Palau
declaringWar: Your actions demand a response. We are ready for battle.
attacked: You underestimate our resolve. This will be a costly mistake.
defeated: Our spirit is not broken, only tested. We will rise again.

name: Tuvalu
declaringWar: By divine will, our path is clear. Let the conflict commence.
attacked: Our faith is our shield. You will find no easy victory here.
defeated: Though humbled, our spirit remains strong, guided by the Almighty.

name: Solomon Islands
declaringWar: Your trespasses demand retribution. Our resolve is firm.
attacked: You have brought conflict to our shores. We will defend what is ours.
defeated: The battle is lost, but our people's strength endures.

name: Tonga
declaringWar: Our ancient lineage calls for justice. Let the drums of war beat.
attacked: You challenge the spirit of Tonga. This aggression will not stand.
defeated: Our pride remains, even in this bitter moment.

name: Samoa
declaringWar: The Fa'a Samoa will prevail. Our path is chosen.
attacked: You have brought strife to our peaceful shores. We will resist.
defeated: Though we fall, the Samoan way of life will continue.

name: Cook Islands
declaringWar: Our foundations are strong. You force our hand.
attacked: You have awakened the watchful spirit of our islands. Prepare for resistance.
defeated: Our legs may tire, but our spirit remains watchful.

name: Niue
declaringWar: Our resolve is as deep as the ocean. We accept your challenge.
attacked: You have come to our shores with ill intent. We will stand firm.
defeated: The battle is lost, but our connection to this land remains.
